title: AI Governance Basics
content: AI governance involves risk management, compliance frameworks, and responsible deployment of artificial intelligence models in line with standards such as NIST AI RMF and ISO/IEC 42001.

title: ML Model Lifecycle
content: The ML model lifecycle includes data collection, preprocessing, training, evaluation, deployment, monitoring, and eventual retirement or retraining.

title: Model Monitoring
content: Model monitoring involves tracking performance metrics, data drift, concept drift, and ensuring that the model remains within acceptable risk and accuracy thresholds.
